body:
Summary

I can't download the current JDK: `jdk@8u172-b11`.

### Expected Result

To be able to download (and install) the current default jdk (`jdk@8u172-b11`).

### Actual Result

Failure, see below

### Steps to reproduce the issue

I can download the previous tarball (I killed it via ^C after it ran for a bit) but the current one fails immediately.

```console
(alice)[14:20:45]spack-rpaths>>./bin/spack fetch jdk@8u141-b15
==> Fetching http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u141-b15/336fa29ff2bb4ef291e347e091f7f4a7/jdk-8u141-linux-x64.tar.gz
##                                                                         3.1%^C
==> Error: Keyboard interrupt.
(alice)[14:20:59]spack-rpaths>>./bin/spack fetch jdk@8u172-b11
==> Fetching http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u172-b11/a58eab1ec242421181065cdc37240b08/jdk-8u172-linux-x64.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Fetching from http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u172-b11/a58eab1ec242421181065cdc37240b08/jdk-8u172-linux-x64.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: All fetchers failed for jdk-8u172-b11-bv2vbfc57hceiolmuhi23rmgh5sjg4to
(alice)[14:21:05]spack-rpaths>>
```

### Information on your system

This includes:

 1. Mac (shouldn't matter for the `fetch` stage).
 2. None that seem relevant (famous last words...).
title: Unable to download the current JDK from Oracle
